cause.description:
Wikipedia got it right: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Post_irony
1. The Radicalization of Healthcare Against Our Senior Citizens: It's what's for dinner.
2. Fight Em' There So We Don't Have To Give Them a Free Ride On The Anti-Family Gravy Train to Bleeding-Heart Land.
3. The Rape of Our Right To Choice will only cause another Vietnam.
cause.mission: Raise awareness and understanding of Post-Irony within the modern cultural discourse.
cause.name: Post-Irony
